overview:
Jack Binder is a film producer of major studio and independent feature film and television shows and the founder of Filmbudget.com http://filmbudget.com/film_budgets

Filmbudget.com creates custom film budgets by a line producer to get investors.

Jack Binder is the producer of “Reign Over Me” and “The Upside of Anger” to name a few of his films.

Binder also founded Michigan Film Production http://michiganfilmproduction.com to help filmmakers appreciate the state and the 40-42% film tax incentive.
